body:
Hey guys, so for the past month I had been working on a 16x fps pack meant to optimise Avicus gameplay. I had been having other players already do some testing in the past and had made a forums post about what you guys would like in the pack so at least it's a community pack in a way :)

The Pack Includes:
- clear glass (with a dotted border so you are able to see the glass, really good imo)
- low fire
- clear inventory
- smoother blocks because smooth blocks are amazing
- cool crosshair
- extremely low 'tall grass' (great for those maps with excessive tall grass)
- short and funny looking swords (compared to what you are used to)
- obviously it is 16x
- bow indicators
- clear underwater view
- raised my fps by 20-30 (not clickbait!)(gone right!)
- automatic pvp god (not clickbait)(no client!)(NO HACKS!?!!?!) (fast and ez!)
- and much more! (read in a typical commercial voice)

I didn't include screenshots because I kept everything under wraps, and I wanted it so those that really wanted it would download instead of people looking at 3 screenshots and saying "it sucks". I want people getting an immediate and full experience when they first download the pack. So with that being said, the link is below:

Link: http://www.mediafire.com/file/nv822ch3xnfd4oy/2Gud+16x.zip

title: 2Gud 16x Pack Release :)
